content: I completely understand your perspective, and it's important to hold event organizers accountable for their actions and learn from past mistakes. Controversies and issues can have a negative impact on the experience and enjoyment of the Games for everyone involved, including athletes and spectators. By addressing these issues and taking steps to prevent them from happening in future events, organizers can help create a better experience for everyone involved. At the same time, it's important to recognize the significant effort and expertise required to organize a large event, and to support and encourage organizers in their efforts to deliver successful events.
